## OlpDataProvider class

\[\[DataProvider\]\] implementation for OLP catalogs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class OlpDataProvider implements DataProvider 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [connect()](./harp-olp-utils.olpdataprovider.connect.md) |  | Connect to the data source. Returns a promise to wait for successful (or failed) connection. |
|  [getTile(tileKey, abortSignal)](./harp-olp-utils.olpdataprovider.gettile.md) |  | Load the data of a \[\[Tile\]\] asynchronously in form of an \[\[ArrayBufferLike\]\]. |
|  [ready()](./harp-olp-utils.olpdataprovider.ready.md) |  | Returns <code>true</code> if it has been connected successfully. |
